data.name: The Longest Five Minutes / 世界一長い５分間 - Digital Soundtrack / デジタル・サウンドトラック
data.detailed_description:
The Longest Five Minutes - Digital Soundtrack includes a whopping 80-tracks! 41 tracks come from The Longest Five Minutes and 39 tracks come from SYUPRO-DX's Collection - a catalog of their game titles! Check the tracklist below!
The Longest Five Minutes (41 tracks)
  1. Opening
  2. First Flashback
  3. Battle with the Demon King
  4. At the End of a Long Fight
  5. Searching for a HAven
  6. The Manly
  7. Let There Be Peace on This Colorful Creation
  8. Battle Victory
  9. Matsuno
  10. Souvenir
  11. Stockwood
  12. Funky*Fire*Railroad
  13. Port Goporei
  14. Janice's Winery
  15. Tiny Lariat
  16. Kushana
  17. Port Bararakerume
  18. Naraca
  19. Steamy Hot Springs Infiltration Mission
  20. A Comical Scene
  21. The Gates of Hell
  22. Galactica of Hell
  23. Money Heaven
  24. The Rich Man's Mansion
  25. Servant of the Demon King
  26. Fortress Prison
  27. Stardust Island
  28. Yasaka
  29. Cowen
  30. Heaven's Drive
  31. Mount Kuuretsu
  32. Tenmagahara
  33. Fog Corridor
  34. Who Are These Party Members!?
  35. Daydream
  36. Norbeegee
  37. Fierce Battle with the Demon King
  38. Stage of Emergency
  39. Finishing the Demon King
  40. The Old Man and the Pier
  41. Memories
